Name: Hero Elixir
Description: Brewed at Castle Village by Camilla. Grants heroic attributes.

DescriptionLocalization.de: Im Schlossdorf von Camilla gebraut. Gewährt heldenhafte Attribute.
DescriptionLocalization.es: Elaborado en Castle Village por Camilla. Otorga atributos heroicos.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Brassée à Castle Village par Camilla. Accorde des attributs héroïques.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Főzött Camilla kastélyfalujában. Hősies tulajdonságokat ad.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Prodotta al Castle Village da Camilla. Concede attributi eroici.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: カミラがキャッスルビレッジで醸造。英雄的な属性を付与します。
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 카밀라가 캐슬 빌리지에서 양조했습니다. 영웅적인 속성을 부여합니다.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Fabricada no Castelo Village por Camilla. Concede atributos heróicos.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Fabricada no Castelo Village por Camilla. Concede atributos heróicos.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Camilla tarafından Castle Village'de demlendi. Kahramanca özellikler verir.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 卡米拉在城堡村酿造。授予英雄属性。
